description:
With a history that dates back to 1998, the Law Offices of Mann & Elias in Irvine, California, has provided unmatched legal advocacy and support to clients throughout the greater Los Angeles metro region and surrounding areas for more than 21 years. Focusing solely on employment law and personal injury, we can deliver the highest level of representation possible for your serious legal challenge.

Whether you experienced a violation of your rights as an employee or suffered an injury or lost a loved one due to someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, you can rely on our more than 40 years of combined legal experience and outstanding trial skills to help you obtain the justice you seek. Devoted to providing the highest level of representation possible, we will partner with you to fully understand your needs and goals so we can best assist with helping you piece your life back together.

Recognized for our success and unwavering commitment to those we serve, our attorneys have earned numerous accolades from our peers, and our law firm has enjoyed many positive testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients. To find out more about how the Law Offices of Mann & Elias can best help you secure a brighter and more financially stable future for you and your loved ones, schedule a free case evaluation by calling our office or visiting our website.

As an added measure of convenience, we have an additional office in Beverly Hills, and we work on a contingency basis, so we will not require a fee unless we secure finances on your behalf. We promise to do all we can to see you through this difficult and uncertain time in your life and to significantly increase your chances of obtaining the full amount of compensation you deserve.
